awd_titl_txt: Stimulating Responses to the Statewide Systemic Initiative
awd_abstract_narration: This project is designed to provide a mechanism for the                         National Governors Association to work with Governors and                       other state policy makers and assist them in becoming                           advocates for mathematics and science education reform                          through systemic strategies. A conference joined to meetings                    of the Education Commission of the States will bring                            together the key players from the states to present and                         discuss the issues at hand. A number of follow-up activities                    will enhance the efforts made at the conference by                              networking the participants in a nationwide effort to                           incorporate systemic strategies into education reform.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
